name: full-stack-open-part3
description: Dedicated repository for part3 solutions for exercises of Full Stack Open course, University of Helsinki

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fso-phonebook-frontend/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../full-stack-open-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Karol Karnas
